doc.content: Milford Humane Society has cats and kittens available for adoption at the PetsMart store in Bellingham on Rte. 126. Cats are shown in the Love-A-Pet center. Adoptions are done on Mondays and Fridays from 7 to 9 p.m. and on Saturdays from 11 a.m. to 4 p.m. DARBY AND MARLON are 4-month-old brothers. They are very cute and both are short-haired. Darby is tiger and white and is a little more out-going than his brother, who is a gray tiger. They would like to be placed together. EMMAEmma is about 2 years old and a short-haired gray tiger. DUSTIN AND DREW are 4-month-old, short-haired brothers (also the brothers of Darby and Marlon.) They would like to be placed together.
